name: Room with big terrace & private bath
description: Central and quiet 15m2 room (Not Apartment!) with en suite bathroom and sunroof terrace with sun all day. 160x200 cm queen size bed, tables, chairs,  32" HD TV & BluRay player.  Self service breakfeast included.

name: Spacious room in vibrant F-hain
description: High ceilings, wooden floors, white walls, and lots of light through the big windows are just some of the things that make this room special. The room has brand new furniture including a desk, chair, bookshelf, a big wardrobe, nightstand and a 160cm wide Queen size bed.  The apartment is located in Friedrichshain, close to Frankfurter Tor, in one of the best café/restaurant/club districts in Berlin. The room is quite big and has space for all your bags and stuff that you bring. The wardrobe can easily fit the clothes for 2 people and you have a desk and chair if you want to get some work done. The apartment is situated in the very heart of Friedrichshain, with just a minute's walk to restaurants, pubs, clubs and cosy cafés. You will be able to access your room, the shared kitchen and shared bathroom.

name: Central & sunny apartment balkony
description: 1 big room 2 minuts away from Leopoldplatz (U9,(URL HIDDEN) big, cheerful room with sunny balcony and view to Nazarethkirche. The apartment has one bathroom and kitchen. We love cooking, so our kitchen is well equipped with utensils and cooking dishes. You also find washing mashine, dishwasher and microwave. Up to 4 people can sleep in the apartment. There is one loft bed (1,40 -2,00m) and one sleeping couch 1,50-2,00m). Bed linen and towels are included. Normaly this is a two bedroom apt, we closed a small room because of our private things. So you can use 55m² of the 70m² apt included bathroom and kitchen. Free highspeed Wifi is also included. You can contact us at everytime. you have the apt for your own. During your entire stay, we will be contactable by mobile phone, email and Airbnb. This Area of Wedding is becomming a nicer neighboorhood every day. New beautyfull coffees and little restaurants open up like flowers. Also a lot of artists settled down.

name: BanPin HomeStay by PraPhai
description: BanPin Homestay offers a cozy retreat in the heart of the city, boasting a spacious interior and a warm, inviting atmosphere. Situated in close proximity to the main train station, it provides convenient access for travelers. Surrounded by the serenity of the locale, guests can explore the nearby stunning temples, immersing themselves in the rich cultural tapestry of the region. With its charming ambiance and convenient location, BanPin Homestay offers a delightful haven for those seeking comfort and tranquility during their travels.

name: BanPin Test Data
description: Die Wohnung liegt in einer ruhigen Lage in Tempelhof-Schöneberg Parkplätze sind vor der Tür. Die öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel sind zu Fuß in 3-6 Minuten erreichbar. Es steht Ihnen auch eine Mikrowelle, Kühlschrank, Herd, Teller sowie Besteck zu Verfügung. Einkaufsmöglichkeit sind in der Nähe zu Fuß 5min Sehr schöne und ruhige Lage sehr nah an der Platz der Luftbrücke und vielen. Bett Maße sind 120x200 cm. W Lan, TV Ich wohne nebenan wenn was sein sollte einfach klingeln oder anrufen bin immer erreichbar Die Freundlichkeit Bus, U- Bahn, S-Bahn sind alle zu Fuß erreichbar Die größe des Bettes ist 120x200 m

name: Kreuzberg, Spacious, Quiet, Terrace
description: Welcome to our classic Altbau Wohnung right between Görlitzer Bahnhof, Schlesisches Tor, Kottbusser Tor & the Spree (Right near everything you MUST see). The Apartment is completely renovated & has everything you will need to make your stay in Berlin an unforgettable experience. The Apt has high ceilings and polished floorboards throughout and a new Kitchen and bathroom.  We love the Apartment and the surrounding area and are sure you will too.  We have everything you may need during your stay from towels to kitchenware to table tennis bats!!! We also have maps and info on Berlin you are welcome to borrow for your stay. Inclusions; Private Bedroom Queen Bed (One fold-out sofa Bed 140cm x 200cm and One Mattress 160cm x 200cm which can be placed on the floor) Wireless Internet New kitchen including all extras you may need New Bathroom with towels/soap/shampoo/hairdryer Dishwasher Lots of Sun Roller Blinds Washing machine  Lounge and dining table 2 Extra Bikes for you to use We only rent the Apartment while we are away but w...
